Package index

Core Object & Classes

Main S4 classes, constructor, package documentation, and example dataset.

`[[`(<Shennong>,<character>,<ANY>) `[[<-`(<Shennong>,<character>,<missing>,<ShennongReduction>) show(<Shennong>)
Show method for Shennong objects
sn_initialize_shennong_object()
Create a Shennong Object
so
Demo Shennong Object

Data Accessors

Functions to retrieve data and metadata from Shennong objects.

Get Default Assay

Get Sample Identities

Get the active layer
sn_active_reduction() `sn_active_reduction<-`()
Get the active reduction name for a given assay
sn_assays()
Get Assay Names

Fetch data from a Shennong object

Get Layer Data
sn_layers()
Get Layer Names
sn_metadata()
Get Sample Metadata
sn_reductions()
Get Dimensional Reductions
sn_features()
Get Feature Names
sn_samples()
Get Sample Names
sn_levels() `sn_levels<-`()
Get Identity Levels

Add an assay to a Shennong object
